subject: Baseplate
description_text:
Good Afternoon,
I received my pedals today, and they are awesome. But I didn’t see the
baseplate I ordered with it. I am wondering why it didn’t come with the
pedals, and could I get it in a reasonable time? If you need the order
number please let me know. Thank you, and have a good day.

conversations.body_text: Hi Lane Davis, ​ Could you please provide your order number? We’ll contact our warehouse team to investigate—there may have been an oversight with the base plate shipment. We’ll get back to you as soon as we have an update. If it was indeed missed, we will arrange an immediate reshipment and provide you with a new tracking number. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Order Number : SSN1576

On Fri, Jun 6, 2025 at 17:52 service@simsonn.com

Hi Lane Davis,  We’ve checked and found that you purchased the pedals from our official website, and your order number is #SSN1576. Please note that the base plate is not included in this order. Kindly double-check your order details, and feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

Yes, but I added the baseplate to my order and the price of the base plate
was added to the price. So I’m confused as to how I paid for the base plate
and I didn’t receive it.

On Fri, Jun 6, 2025 at 17:55 service@simsonn.com

If you’d like a photo that can prove so, I can send one. The pedals alone
were 193.90 and w/ the base plate it’s 251.80. With the Discount code
FFLV20 I got $20 off and $9.90 shipping ended my total at $241.70. Not
$183.80.

Hi Lane Davis,  After reviewing your order details and pricing, we confirm that you did pay for the base plate. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We’ve already arranged for the warehouse to ship the base plate today, and we’ll provide you with the tracking number once it has been dispatched. The issue may have occurred because the product image did not show the base plate, and the information was only listed in the specifications, which the warehouse staff may have overlooked. Thank you for your understanding and support!

Hi，Lane Davis，    We have just confirmed that the black base plate is currently out of stock at our U.S. warehouse. We expect new stock to arrive soon and will arrange shipment of the base plate to you immediately upon arrival. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

Do they have a silver/chrome one in stock? I can always spray paint it
black if I really want to, but I also don’t really mind color of the base
plate that much.

On Fri, Jun 6, 2025 at 18:14 service@simsonn.com

Good Afternoon Simsonn,
I’m just checking in on that base plate. It’s been about a week, and I’m
just wondering when I would get that? I was told that the US warehouse
didn’t have any in stock and would get new stock soon, and as soon as that
happened they would ship it out. But I haven’t received an updates
regarding the base plate yet.
Thank you for your time.

Hi Lane Davis,     Sorry for not getting back to you in time, we have just finished our holiday . Your baseboards have been shipped, here is your USPS logistics number: 9234690388491900184956   https://t.17track.net/en#nums=9234690388491900184956   Your package is awaiting pickup, please contact USPS for redelivery. We are sorry for the trouble this has caused you, sincere apologies!
